home.title: Share Link Gan
home.tagline: One link to rule them all. Connect your audiences to all of your content with just one click. Highly personalizable, forever free.
home.features_theme_desc: Match your brand perfectly with stunning presets like Glassmorphism, Neon, and Minimal.
home.features_unlimited_desc: Add as many links as you want. Embed thumbnails, social icons, and reorder them flawlessly.
home.features_fast_desc: Built on Next.js 14 and edge infrastructure for instant load times globally.
